name: Malis Adventure
description:
A small chicken starts in a world.

Your first impression is really nice. The world is lovely, you can pickup seeds and shoot them with space. But then, there are foxes who haunt you.

Your target is to escape, before the darkness arrives and kills you

WE COULDNT FINISH THE GAME, BECAUSE WE USED JAVA WITH OPENGL. WE BUILD OUR OWN ENGINE FROM SCRATCH, BUT WE RAN OUT OF TIME. SO WE LEARNED: USE AN ENGINE
